'''''Zoo Tycoon''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to use the [[Omni-Ubiquity Net]] item to capture 1 [[Wildlife|wild animal]].

==Trivia==
{{Transclude|Zoo Tycoon|Trivia}}
* The original name {{Lang|"Trying to Tame Me?"|zh=「是想要驯服我吗？」}} is a reference to the novel ''{{w|The Little Prince}}''.
